name: Roven Omnibus — display lowest price
author: RovenThemes

sections.description:
Directive (EU) 2019/2161 of the European Parliament, also knows as the EU Omnibus Directive, introduced among other things the requirement to display the lowest price of a product in the last 30 days, including any discounts or promotions. This information must be clearly visible and easily accessible to consumers before they make a purchase. This plugin does exactly that.

Directive (EU) 2019/2161 of the European Parliament

Article 6a
1. Any announcement of a price reduction shall indicate the prior price applied by the trader for a determined period of time prior to the application of the price reduction.
2. The prior price means the lowest price applied by the trader during a period of time not shorter than 30 days prior to the application of the price reduction.

Read more: Directive 2019/2161.

Plugin Features:

  • Saves and store product prices
  • Configurable how long to store historic product prices, default 30 days for standard products and 10 days for perishable products
  • Configure where to display prices

short_description: The plugin helps wooCommerce powered ecommerce websites comply with the requirements of the EU Omnibus Directive.
